title: Pbe signup concerns
body: So ive signed up for the pbe before but it was a while back during that time i didnt know that you didnt have to sign up again if you changed your league name, i just wanted to make sure that my chances of getting into the pbe didn't go down i just wanted to be sure i may still have a chance of getting into the pbe, its prob been a year since i've signed up by now and i have a feeling me signing up again due to a name change my be a reason for a long wait.

replies.body: It is true! The PBE are signups are down for maintenance and have been for quite some time. Best to check the[ PBE Signup Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/pbe-signups-open) for when it does go back up.
Do i have to sign up again once its open? i have already signed up before but it was a year ago.

I'm sorry to say this but PBE sign ups are closed you can't sign up for them if you haven't gotten your account authorized yet. So you have to wait till they open the site back up its been closed since 04/04/2017 so idk when and they haven't specified. 
https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed
ye ik that i signed up a year ago when it was open.
eh bud if I signed up I'm pretty sure u can
I already signed up a year ago i just wanted to know if my application is still eligible.
